column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Come early
column2: I mean before noon at least. They are always run out the pastries in the afternoon. Which is a good thing! Get Kouign-amann! very buttery
column4: and it has caramelized sugar. Almond croissant is very2 good. Big and flaky. The almond filling is very good
column6: and not too almondy. Latte is very consistent
column7: I like it. This place is one of the top-notch french bakery in Houston. And don't forget to get some baguette home!
